00033 #ifndef getopt_h
00034 #define getopt_h
00035 
00036 #ifdef __cplusplus
00037 extern "C" {
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 extern int opterr;     /* if error message should be printed */
00041 extern int optind;     /* index into parent argv vector */
00042 extern int optopt;     /* character checked for validity */
00043 extern int optreset;   /* reset getopt */
00044 extern char *optarg;   /* argument associated with option */
00045 
00046 int
00047 getopt(int nargc, char *const *nargv, const char *ostr);
00048 
00049 #ifdef __cplusplus
00050 }
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 #endif  /* getopt_h */
